subject: Re: Typo in /debian/README
body:
On Sun, Apr 08, 2007 at 12:52:30PM -0400, Yan Morin wrote:
> It seems there is a little typo in /debian/README file
> [..]
> "The current tested development snapshot is named etch."
> 
> etch should be replace by lenny like in the README.html

Thanks Yan,

The README files will be fixed soon.

-- 
Simon Paillard


--
